title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.32 - Reporting of compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.32 - Reporting of compliance

State Regulations

Each operator shall, prior to commencing operations, and
annually thereafter, perform a system integrity and security assessment
conducted by an independent professional selected by the operator, subject to
the approval of the commission. The independent professional's report on the
assessment shall be submitted to the commission and shall include: (a) scope of review; (b) name and company affiliation of each
person who conducted the assessment; (c) date of the assessment; (d) findings; (e) recommended corrective action, if
applicable; and
(f) the operator's
response to the findings and recommended corrective action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5329.32

Adopted

New

York State Register June 26, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 26, eff. 6/26/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
